text: Ani jevha tyancyavara ekhada azaba (allahaca prakopa) yeta ase, tevha mhanata ki he musa! Amacyasathi apalya palanakartyajavala tya vayadyadvare, jo tumhala dila, du'a (prarthana) kara. Jara tumhi amacyavaruna azaba hatavila tara avasya amhi tumacyavara imana rakhu ani tumacyasobata isra'ilacya putranna pathavu
